item.description:
Join us for one of our small group "house meetups" at the home of members Elaine & Francis McGillicuddy in Portland. As many of you know, Elaine and Francis are a few years into the "conversion" of their small city lot into a permaculture oasis complete with front and side "orchards" (in lieu of lawns), two ponds, cold frame and hoop house, compost bins, backyard chickens, solar-powered waterfall and more. They would like our help this time to, perhaps, solve a mysterious pond leak, identify some of the wild plants emerging in their yard and maybe trouble-shoot a tree problem if we can!

6:30 Meet and have a casual guided tour with Elaine
7:15-ish Potluck Supper
8:00 Announcements and Discussion/Problem-Solving
8:30-ish Wrap-up

Potluck Breakdown
Last Name A-G: Bring a salad or side dish
Last Name H-M: Bring a snack or appetizer-type item
Last Name N-S: Bring bread or a beverage
Last Name T-Z: Bring a dessert

Please remember to bring your own potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/cup/napkin)! Please consider bringing your digital camera and posting up a few photos after the event!

Potluck food safety ideas here:
http://fycs.ifas.ufl....

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: August House Meetup
